segments.text: The kitchen looks so ordinary, but there's trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is carefully drying that plate, lost in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the sink is overflowing, water spilling everywhere unseen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware she is of the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies, but it's not safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches on that unstable stool, so full of innocent adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and gets hurt? It would be awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, her little hand outstretched in hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting a sweet moment together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems idyllic, untouched by the indoor woes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for this family; small oversights can lead to big sorrows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be a hassle to fix later.
segments.speaker: PAR
